text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The center part? You mean the<n>highlight of the
performance? The bit<n>where you come to the middle to<n>
dance?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You want me to do that part?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Y...yeah. I've been think'n of ask'n<n>you from the start. I'm
not right for<n>that part!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I'm just...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Put yours on so we can line up.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I... can't hold a candle to you gals.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But I can't back out now without<n>caus'n problems. So
please, just put<n>me in the backgroundâ€”The spotlight<n>
should belong to you two!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Really? Okay, I can do that part.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: If that's what you really want.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Curren...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
There you are, Yukino! What's up<n>with you? You were
acting kinda<n>strange back there.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's noth'n! I was just... so<n>amazed by how pretty the
costumes<n>looked!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: But I'm just peachy now!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I played it down, but... I should really<n>tell City since we're
dancing t'gether.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (I am doing the right thing, aren't I?<n>Yeah, sure I am...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Hey, you. Free right now?<n>Come with me.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: What? ...WHAT?! Y-you... You mean<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Calm down. I'm not gonna eat you. I<n>just want to race.
Come with me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There's only so much I can hone my<n>skill on my own. I
need the feeling of<n>chasing prey. Let's go.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: What did you mean by "prey"? Ah,<n>wait, Briaaaan!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: RRRAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... S-sorry... I wasn'tmuch help...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Brian is super strong... But that's not<n>th'only reason I lost.
My legs... feel<n>weird today...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Where's your instinct?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Instinct. It's what's left behind once<n>you shave away all
the unnecessary<n>stuff. It's what drives you at the most<n>
basic level.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Most racers unleash that instinct on<n>the track, but I didn't
see an ounce of<n>it in you tonight.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So what is it you desire? Youwouldn't be racing if there wasn'tsomething.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Um...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Ugh, forget it. I'm going to run some<n>more.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The road ahead is really dark. Don't<n>fall over on your way
back.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (My instincts...)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: ...What do I want to do?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(The night sky is far brighter in my<n>hometown than it is here.
It's like a<n>sea of stars so deep you could dive<n>right into it.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(But the brightest stars in my eyes<n>were the city girls. I
admired them so<n>much through the TV screen.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Walk'n tall and confident, ambitious,<n>stand'n on their own
two feet... Just<n>like City, actually.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But I've made up my mind. I'm going<n>to do this right!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I get it now... City's so beautiful<n>'cause she's her own
person mak'n<n>her own decision.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(I've never heard her doubting<n>herself and shy'n away
from a<n>challenge. I must look so silly,<n>chicken'n out of
center stage.)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(Truth is... if I do what Brian said and<n>remove all the fluff,
what I really<n>want... when all's said and done is...)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: I wanna be...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
More than anyth'n, I wanna be... an<n>honest-to-goodness...
city girl!
